short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension makes it easy to copy your investment information into a spreadsheet

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Tired of copying numbers out of your Vanguard account one by one? This little extension copies them all in a single click.

Be sure to check out the README on how to get the data formatted in Excel or Sheets easily.
